Matrix A:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297	

Matrix B:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297	

Matrix C = A + B:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297	

Matrix D = A * 2:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297	

Matrix E = B - A:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297	

Matrix F:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297	

Matrix G = F * F:
0.956	0.094	0.799	
0.727	0.537	0.468	
0.969	0.964	0.297
